Sentencas: The novel La(1-x)Ca(x)Ti(1-y)TayO(3-delta) nano perovskites with high oxygen vacancies have been prepared for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) by facile hydrothermal method.
Titulo: Novel La1-xCaxTi1-yTayO3-d perovskites with enhanced conductivity for solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: To enhance the oxygen vacancies, structural, thermal and chemical stability, the phase composition of the materials was varied with multiple x & y values like (0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8 and 1).
Titulo: Novel La1-xCaxTi1-yTayO3-d perovskites with enhanced conductivity for solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: All the as prepared compositions of La(1-x)Ca(x)Ti(1-y)TayO(3-delta) were undergone heat treatments in autoclave, calcined at 700 & DEG;C and sintered at 1000 C. These modified perovskite oxides can add in hefty point defects, such as oxygen vacancies that compensate dopants or are part of an inherent off-stoichiometry.
Titulo: Novel La1-xCaxTi1-yTayO3-d perovskites with enhanced conductivity for solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: These defects have high mobilities in La(1-x)Ca(x)Ti(1-y)TayO(3-delta) perovskites, making it most suitable for electrochemical energy conversion devices.
Titulo: Novel La1-xCaxTi1-yTayO3-d perovskites with enhanced conductivity for solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The appropriate phase purity, structural properties, lattice parameters and morphology of the perovskite were inspected.
Titulo: Novel La1-xCaxTi1-yTayO3-d perovskites with enhanced conductivity for solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity of sintered pellets was analyzed using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Novel La1-xCaxTi1-yTayO3-d perovskites with enhanced conductivity for solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The electrical behavior of La(1-x)Ca(x)Ti(1-y)TayO(3-delta) is enhanced at lower operating temperature and long-term structural stability, phase purity is also improved owing to the inclusion of Calcium and Tantalum (La(1-x)Ca(x)Ti(1-y)TayO(3-delta)).
Titulo: Novel La1-xCaxTi1-yTayO3-d perovskites with enhanced conductivity for solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The enhancement in electrical conductivity, electro-catalytic activity is credited by means of partial replacement of Ca and Ta in the perovskite structure.
Titulo: Novel La1-xCaxTi1-yTayO3-d perovskites with enhanced conductivity for solid oxide fuel cell electrodes
